creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
text: there should be a way to view/edit pages in the archive.

creator: michi@apache.org
text:
I don't think that archived documents should be editable, but on the other hand
as long as revisions are being kept ....

i agree. it's not necessary to edit pages in the archive. but there should be a
possibility to view archived pages without moving them out of the archive.
somthing like a link in the site-tab/overview.
creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
andreas@apache.org
